    • Method Detail

      • generateIsoSurface

        public TriangleMeshData generateIsoSurface(double isovalue)
        Method generates iso-surface model. Data is returned as TriangleMeshData.
        Parameters:
        isovalue - - value at which to generate iso-surface
        Returns:
        TriangleMeshData - generated iso-surface in TriangleMeshData format.

      • removeDuplicatePoints

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> removeDuplicatePoints(java.util.ArrayList<org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F> inputVertexes)
        method that reduces number of vertexes by removing vertexes with same coordinates this method changes input ArrayList of points. The index list for triangulation of these points is returned by this function. Indexing is started from 1.
        Parameters:
        inputVertexes - array list of calculated vertexes
        Returns:
        index list for triangle faces

      • saveVerticesToObj

        public static void saveVerticesToObj(java.util.ArrayList<org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F> vertices,
                                     java.lang.String filename)
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        saves ArrayList of vertices in .obj file
        Parameters:
        vertices - vertices in ArrayList<DenseMatrix64F> format
        filename - filename of destination file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - throws if file not found or cannot be created!

        Getter method for progress property
        Returns:
        DoubleProperty progress of isovalue generation propery
